img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6a/Wukong_Pagoda_12.jpg)
The interior tunnel will end with a sealed cell gate, as well as a Starved Abomination that will try to ambush you from a corner. Let the creature tire itself out swinging wildly with its sickle before taking it down with just a few hits.
img_below_text:
If you head along the outside path, you'll find another open jail cell bars to re-enter the interior hall and reach another green Wisp, but be ready to deal with the ambushing Cyan Bat above and Abomination below.
![Wukong Pagoda 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e4/Wukong_Pagoda_14.jpg)

![Wukong Pagoda 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e4/Wukong_Pagoda_14.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dark and ominous scene within a tunnel in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, armed with a staff, stands near a sealed cell gate, preparing for an encounter. The preceding text describes an ambush by a Starved Abomination near this location, while the following text mentions paths leading to further enemies and items. The image emphasizes the tense atmosphere and the player's readiness for combat.
